writings.text: 柳の下にいつも泥鰌はおらぬ
柳の下に何時も泥鰌は居らぬ

readings.text: やなぎのしたにいつもどじょうはおらぬ

glossary: a fox is not taken twice in the same snare
there are no birds in last year's nest
there aren't always loaches under the willow tree
